summary: Application with a 'wrong question review' feature; user requests removing the educational article function from that review and resolving a deployment/build configuration error.
known_issues: Build/deployment is failing due to a configuration error (requires fix before rerunning build).

existing_features.title: Remove the educational/study-article functionality from the Wrong Answers Review flow so users cannot open or view a Study Article from the wrong-question review experience.
Fix the configuration issue preventing builds/deployments from running successfully, and ensure the app can be rebuilt and redeployed after the fix.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the educational article function from the 'wrong question review' section.
Fix the build/deployment configuration error and rerun the build.

projectName: Remove study-article access from Wrong Answers Review and resolve deployment configuration failure
